Uses of Class
popt4jlib.LIP.AdditiveSolverMT.Node

  • Packages that use AdditiveSolverMT.Node 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib.LIP
    package contains parallel implementations of some well-known algorithms for Linear Integer Programming, including Balas' Additive Algorithm (dating back to an Operations Research article of 1965).

    • Uses of AdditiveSolverMT.Node in popt4jlib.LIP

      Fields in popt4jlib.LIP declared as AdditiveSolverMT.Node 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static AdditiveSolverMT.Node AdditiveSolverMT._optimal 
      Methods in popt4jlib.LIP that return AdditiveSolverMT.Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static AdditiveSolverMT.Node AdditiveSolverMT.selectNode()
      return the first element in the queue pointed to by _heap.
      Methods in popt4jlib.LIP with parameters of type AdditiveSolverMT.Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void AdditiveSolverMT.branch(int col, AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      creates two new Node objects (with different values for the x_col variable), and puts them in the min-heap _heap.
      private void AdditiveSolverMT.close(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      sets the status of the Node argument to false (closed).
      private int AdditiveSolverMT.computeNode(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current, IntArray1SparseVector bbar)
      processes the current Node, possibly modifying the 2nd argument as well.
      private boolean AdditiveSolverMT.fixSumTestVars(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current, IntArray1SparseVector bbar, IntArray1SparseVector Pplus)
      fixes free variables to 0 or 1 depending on the constraints.
      private void AdditiveSolverMT.imposeConstraint(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      modifies this solver's vector's _b last (augmented) component, as well the matrix's _A last (augmented) row, if the condition _zbar < _csum holds.
      private int AdditiveSolverMT.infSum(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      return the free variable index j (column) that minimizes the quantity Σi{(_bbar[i]-_A[i][j])+} (the sum includes the last -augmented- row of _A and component of _b).
      private void AdditiveSolverMT.LU(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      upper- and lower-bounds the current Node object.
      private static void AdditiveSolverMT.putInOrder(AdditiveSolverMT.Node nd)
      puts the Node nd inside the min-heap pointed to by _heap, in order so that the Nodes' _v._z value is in ascending order (smallest value first).
      protected int AdditiveSolver3.selectVariable(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current) 
      protected int AdditiveSolverMT.selectVariable(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      protected method used to select a free variable given an open node.
      private boolean AdditiveSolverMT.sumTest(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      performs the sum-test check of the Additive Algorithm.
      private void AdditiveSolverMT.updateBbarPplus(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current, IntArray1SparseVector bbar, IntArray1SparseVector Pplus)
      updates the b̄ (bbar) and P+ (Pplus) vectors.
      private static void AdditiveSolverMT.updateZ(AdditiveSolverMT.Node current)
      updates the argument's _z value, as well as _zstar,_zbar,_optimal members if appropriate.
